com.example.anna.colorgame

Class SuperActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.example.anna.colorgame.SuperActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChooseGame, HighScore, MainFrame, MainMenu

    public class SuperActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    This class is a super class for MainFrame, MainMenu, ChooseGame and HighScore activities. It has a set of variables and methods used in those activities.

      Constructor and Description
      SuperActivity()

      This method closes ProgressDialog.

      This method returns an instance of a Thread that is used in SuperActivity.

      This method is used to determine if ProgressDialog is showing or not.

      This method creates new ProgressDialog with specified message.
      void startThreadChooseGame(Context context, Player player, ChooseGame chooseGame)
      This method is used to start a thread in ChooseGame that listens for incoming data and updates UI if needed.

      • validateIP

        public boolean validateIP(java.lang.String ip)
        This method validates IP address in EditText field. It is called when focus state of editIPText is changed. If IP is correct return true and if not return false
        Parameters:
        ip - String
        Returns:
        boolean

      • validateName

        public boolean validateName(java.lang.String name)
        This method validates name in EditText field. It is called when user pushes "Login" button. If edit field is empty or if name is more than 20 character long the input is incorrect and method will return false, else true.
        Parameters:
        name - String
        Returns:
        boolean

      • startProgressDialog

        public void startProgressDialog(java.lang.String message,
                                Context context)
        This method creates new ProgressDialog with specified message. Returns created ProgressDialog.
        Parameters:
        message - String
        context - Context

      • isShowingProgressDialog

        This method is used to determine if ProgressDialog is showing or not.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • closeThread

        public void closeThread()
        This method is used to close thread in any activity. It stops while loop and interrupts thread.
